content: wear your beaming heart on your chest with this warm and playful crochet pullover created in red heart super saver the pattern incorporates 4 shades that can be easily customized to reflect your colors of love practice working stripes on the back and sleeves and crocheting in rounds to create the graphic heart motif stay engaged with double_crochet half_double_crochet ribbing and more it s a fun pattern that showcases your skills with every stitch of love materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m sizes xs/s m/l xl 2/3xl contrast a pretty n pink 0722 2 2 2 3 balls contrast b minty 0520 2 2 2 2 balls contrast c pale plum 0579 2 2 2 3 balls contrast d soft white 0316 2 2 2 2 balls sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m/l 36-42 91 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm gauges 12 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 10 cm 12 double_crochet and 7 row = 4 10 cm
